title: This Full-Suspension Gravel Bike Might Be the Weirdest One We’ve Seen All Year
content:
With 20 mm suspension front and rear, the Made in Poland Antidote Pathseeker really, really makes you wonder what defines a gravel bike.

Read the full article at This Full-Suspension Gravel Bike Might Be the Weirdest One We’ve Seen All Year on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
